name: UIBlurEffect.Style
desc: Blur styles available for blur effect objects.

items.name: case systemUltraThinMaterial
items.desc: An adaptable blur effect that creates the appearance of an ultra-thin material.

items.name: case systemThinMaterial
items.desc: An adaptable blur effect that creates the appearance of a thin material.

items.name: case systemMaterial
items.desc: An adaptable blur effect that creates the appearance of a material with normal thickness.

items.name: case systemThickMaterial
items.desc: An adaptable blur effect that creates the appearance of a material that’s thicker than normal.

items.name: case systemChromeMaterial
items.desc: An adaptable blur effect that creates the appearance of the system chrome.

items.name: case systemUltraThinMaterialLight
items.desc: A blur effect that creates the appearance of an ultra-thin material and is always light.

items.name: case systemThinMaterialLight
items.desc: A blur effect that creates the appearance of a thin material and is always light.

items.name: case systemMaterialLight
items.desc: A blur effect that creates the appearance of a material with normal thickness and is always light.

items.name: case systemThickMaterialLight
items.desc: A blur effect that creates the appearance of a material that’s thicker than normal and is always light.

items.name: case systemChromeMaterialLight
items.desc: A blur effect that creates the appearance of the system chrome and is always light.

items.name: case systemUltraThinMaterialDark
items.desc: A blur effect that creates the appearance of an ultra-thin material and is always dark.

items.name: case systemThinMaterialDark
items.desc: A blur effect that creates the appearance of a thin material and is always dark.

items.name: case systemMaterialDark
items.desc: A blur effect that creates the appearance of a material with normal thickness and is always dark.

items.name: case systemThickMaterialDark
items.desc: A blur effect that creates the appearance of a material that’s thicker than normal and is always dark.

items.name: case systemChromeMaterialDark
items.desc: A blur effect that creates the appearance of the system chrome and is always dark.

items.name: case extraLight
items.desc: The area of the view is lighter than the underlying view.

items.name: case light
items.desc: The area of the view is the same approximate lightness of the underlying view.

items.name: case dark
items.desc: The area of the view is darker than the underlying view.

items.name: case extraDark
items.desc: The area of the view is even more dark than the underlying view.

items.name: case regular
items.desc: A regular blur style that adapts to the user interface style.

items.name: case prominent
items.desc: A blur style for making content more prominent that adapts to the user interface style.
